% Prepreamble follows.
<<LaTeXPrePreamble>>

% Load the documentclass.
\documentclass[<<DocumentClassOptions>>]{amsart}

% Preamble follows.
\RequirePackage{biblatex}
\RequirePackage{ltxcmds}
<<LaTeXPreamble>>

% Define the BibLaTeX resources.
<<BibLaTeXResources>>

% Setup document metadata.
\makeatletter
\@ifpackageloaded{hyperref}{%
	\hypersetup{
		pdftitle = {<<Title>>},
		pdfauthor = {<<AuthorsFullNamesCommaSeparated>>},
		pdfkeywords = {<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>},
		pdfcreator = {<<ScoopTemplateEngineSignature>>}
	}
}{
	\pdfinfo{
		/Title (<<Title>>)
		/Author (<<AuthorsFullNamesCommaSeparated>>)
		/Subject ()
		/Keywords (<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>)
		/Creator (<<ScoopTemplateEngineSignature>>)
	}
}
\makeatother

% Set title and subtitle information.
\title[<<ShortTitle>>]{<<TitleNewlineSubTitle>>}

% Set author and funding information.
<<AuthorsInstitutionsAMS>>
\gdef\shortauthors{<<AuthorsRunningHeadAMS>>}

% Set date information.
\date{<<Date>>}

% Set dedication information.
\dedicatory{<<Dedication>>}

\begin{document}

% Insert the abstract.
<<CommentIfAbstractEmpty>>\begin{abstract}
<<InputAbstract>>
<<CommentIfAbstractEmpty>>\end{abstract}

% Insert the keywords.
\keywords{<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>}

% Insert the Mathematics Subject Classification.
\makeatletter
\ltx@ifpackageloaded{hyperref}{%
\subjclass[2010]{<<MSCWithLinks>>}
}{%
\subjclass[2010]{<<MSC>>}
}
\makeatother

% Typeset the opening page.
\maketitle

% Insert the document body.
<<InputBody>>

% Insert the appendix.
\appendix
<<InputAppendix>>

% Insert the bibliography.
<<BibLaTeXPrintBibliography>>

\end{document}
